review: I purchased two of these units directly from Roku 12/14/14.  I immediately set about installation as soon as I received the units.  I could not get the unit to log into the internet.  It would connect with my WiFi, but could not get through the modem.  After HOURS online and trying to get through to ROKU's nonexistent help line I gave up.  I started working to get RGA's to return the two units.  Many tries on the phone and on their website yielded frustration and no results.  I finally talked with the ROKU customer assistance in Bangalore, India today 1/27/15!  The first time they said they would have to call me back after a 25 min wait to talk with someone.  The second time I got a response after waiting 10 minutes on que.  The answer was that I could not return the units because their 40 day time was over.  Buy an Apple TV instead.  Anyone can connect them in minutes.

I did go through all the setup and found it was probably worth it for those that wanted all thoese features but I just didn't need them.
